trait.name: Frozen Camoflage
entries: While motionless in snowy or icy terrain, the Tundra Hunger is indistinguishable from natural land.

trait.name: False Ground
entries: A creature walking over the Hunger must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity (Acrobatics) check or fall {@condition prone}

trait.name: Tundra Hunger
entries: As a bonus action, the Hunger causes frost-covered tendrils to erupt in a 10-ft radius. Creatures must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength save or be pulled 5 ft. toward it and {@condition restrained} (escape {@dc 15})

action.name: Frost Maw {@recharge 5}
entries: The Hunger splits the earth open in a 10-ft. cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 26 ({@damage 6d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success. Creatures that fail are also knocked {@condition prone}

action.name: Icy Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 6 cold damage.
